## M-BITES Survival

### Wing Tattering

Zero-inflated Beta distribution for damage due to wing tattering
$$
rTatterSize=\left\{\begin{matrix}
x=0; P(ttsz.p)
\\ 
x\sim Beta(ttsz.a,ttsz.b); P(1-ttsz.p)
\end{matrix}\right.
$$
